citations.narrative:
15 Sheep were turned out in a field for the day with a donkey and did not have sufficient shaded space in the outdoor field
for all animals. Sunlight on an 84 F degree day may cause fiber animals to overheat or be uncomfortable. The facility
must ensure that adequate space is provided for shade for all animals at the same time.
Correct by 30 August 2024.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative.
n

narrative:
3.127(a) 
   
Facilities, outdoor. 
15 Sheep were turned out in a field for the day with a donkey and did not have sufficient shaded space in the outdoor field 
for all animals. Sunlight on an 84 F degree day may cause fiber animals to overheat or be uncomfortable. The facility 
must ensure that adequate space is provided for shade for all animals at the same time. 
 
Correct by 30 August 2024. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative. 
 
 n
